title: Sakanya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Japanese, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small traditional izakaya. Chef is Italian and can make authentic Italian vegan pizza (no cheese, just some olive oil). Some English is spoken by waitstaff. Okinomiyaki is also available but is not vegan.
streetAddress: north side of the station, near Ito Yokado
